description: The PERFORMANCE_METRICS table in the synthetic_250_snowflake database represents a collection of metrics related to various performance attributes such as campaign, social, and webinar activities. Each row uniquely identified by the PERFORMANCE_METRIC_ID holds descriptive and specific attributes, indicating specific interactions or results from these activities. As there are no foreign keys or references to other tables, this table functions as a standalone entity within the data model, providing detailed insights into performance metrics for different channels.

columns.name: PERFORMANCE_METRIC_ID
columns.description: This column likely serves as a unique identifier for individual performance metrics within the table. The purpose is to distinguish and reference specific metrics in the dataset.

columns.name: NAME
columns.description: This column represents a sequence of identifiers for different performance metrics, where each identifier is distinguished by a numeric suffix. These identifiers likely serve as labels for categorizing or referencing specific set metrics within performance data sets.

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: This column contains text descriptions associated with specific performance metrics, providing additional context or details for each metric. Each entry corresponds to a numbered performance metric for identification.

columns.name: CAMPAIGN_149_ATTR_0
columns.description: The column indicates whether a specific attribute within campaign 149 is active or relevant. Purpose unclear from available data.
